# post-collapsible



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                             | Type      | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `collapsed`    | `collapsed`     | If `true`, the element is initially collapsed otherwise it is displayed.                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `headingLevel` | `heading-level` | Defines the hierarchical level of the collapsible header within the headings structure. | `number`  | `undefined` |


## Methods

### `toggle(open?: boolean) => Promise<void>`

Triggers the collapse programmatically.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<void>`
